divs: sighting detailsi was home in my small town (brom���lla, sweden) siting outside. me and my girlfriend had talked about ufos and aliens for some days. and in this moment we also talked about ufos. when both of us looking in the sky we noticed first one bright moving star-like object flying straight in a line from noth to south, at a point in the sky another bright star-like object appeared at the line the first one was flying but flying the other direction (south to noth). when the second one appeared the first one slowly disappeared and faded away. the second one did hold that line and traveled as far i cuoled see. not sure if this realy was an ufo or somthing else i dont know about. but this event is worth telling you about. my feeling when this happened was the feeling of awesomeness! please respond to me if this couled be true of if this has another story (like a satelight\junk crash) sorry if i miss spelled somewhere, hope you understand anyway :)
